text: Weingart is a German surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Ben Weingart (born 1888), US real estate developer and philanthropist * Steve Weingart (born 1966), US musician * Peter Weingart (born 1941), German sociology professor * Wolfgang Weingart (born 1941), German graphic designer ==See also== * Weingart Stadium * Weingarten (disambiguation) * Wingard (disambiguation) Category:German-language surnames Category:Jewish surnames
title: Weingart
